::KitKat::

She glared at StarScream. "You will show those who have been here 
long than you some respect StarScream.  Unless Megatron says so, I am 
his second in command.  I am YOUR superior. YOU will follow orders or 
else.  Now,  We are low in number and currently recovering from a 
heavy attack.  We need to regroup and gain in our strength.  then we 
will attack in full forses and those pathetic Maximals won't be able 
to stop us."  She let out an evil chuckle at the thought of revenge.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream nods his head.
> 
> "Alright. I'll wait for Megatron to return." Than Starscream hears 
> the yelling from a bot on the other side of him. He looks at him 
with 
> glaring eyes.
> 
> "Don't talk to me like that! Give me five seconds and I can have 
your 
> blasters so far up your butt you'll be spitting out mech fluid!"
